1.content:
Alright, here is where you will create your own story and character slots. As another rule, always leave one option available for the other folks in case they wanna add their own character, so all Last options will be a “more slots” option.

Now get creating.
1.title: Create your Story Slots

choices: Start with how Ayako first grew
Start with her entering the city
11.content:
Name: Ayako, or Ayakozilla
Age: 2
Height: 450 feet
Appearance: A super-cute baby girl with red hair, soft brown eyes, and a round, chubby tummy. She wears a frilly, pink dress and a white diaper with cats on it.
Personality: Ayako is very sweet and loves to play with tinies and spread happiness. She sometimes destroys things, but only to make way for her cute creations.
Powers: She can hypnotize people with her cuteness, and she breathes out a sparkly pink mist that makes people feel happier and can even make couples fall in love. She can magically repair any damage from her playful rampages and replace normal buildings she destroyed with cute, magical buildings. She also has complete control over plants, which can use both for spreading beauty and as a weapon.
Backstory: Ayako was just a normal Japanese toddler, until one day she ate a magical, glowing pink fruit. The fruit's power suffused her body and turned her into a kaiju goddess of love and innocence. Now she's out to spread her divine cuteness and happiness over the whole world.
Type of story it will be: Growth
Normal or Anthro: Normal
11.title: Story Slot 1

choices: At the beginning, in how she grew
Her start of the day in the morning
With her in the city helping out
With her relaxing on the beach
12.content:
Name: Haruka Stakioni a.k.a. Either Harukazilla or Girlzilla
Age: 9
Height: 160ft
Appearance: https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/yaku... (basing this girl off Haruka from Yakuza in name and appearance though they will be differences)
Personality: Cheerful, nice, playful, energetic
Powers: None
Backstory: Haruka Stakioni was just a normal average Japanese girl,living in Tokyo, Japan, except for one thing though. She is 160ft tall. She was born with some genetic mutation that makes her have huge growth spurs at an early age, and actually grew at a very alarming rate over the years. By age 4, she was like 100ft tall. Apparently everyone was scared of the giant girl at first, but after showing how nice and caring she is, she soon becomes loved in Japan and around the world. Obviously she had to deal with some challenges, like food supplies (eats used vehicles and buildings), clothes (mostly wears swimsuits made for her), navigating around the city, and living quarters, but they all manage pretty well. She has even placed her size to good use in the community, like being a playground for kids, posing for pics, doing some monster movies, and even her favorite part, destroying some buildings for her fans. She ended up with the name Harukazilla, and even Girlzilla as a result, but she doesn’t mind.
Type of story: Growth
Normal

So where we start the life of Harukazilla?
12.title: Haruka Stakioni/Girlzilla

choices: Start when Charlotte first drinks the magic honey
Start with her rampaging a furry city
Start with her rampaging a human city
13.content:
Name: Charlotte
Age: 6
Height: 200 feet (see below)
Appearance: Charlotte is a cute female grizzly bear cub with soft brown fur and blue eyes. She wears a blue dress with red strips and a small red bow in the fur on top of her head.
Personality: Charlotte is an energetic young giantess who loves to rampage playfully and has a voracious appetite, but she also likes to play gently with tinies sometimes.
Powers: She grows bigger every time she eats honey, and she has a predscape https://www.furaffinity.net/view/2558457... where the souls of people she eats are stored so she can regenerate them later.
Backstory: Charlotte was a little anthro bear cub living in a treehouse in the woods with her parents. One day, she drank a jar of magical honey her papa had gathered from a strange hive, and it made her grow into a towering giantess, and she grew even bigger whenever she ate honey of any kind.
Type of Story: Growth
Normal or Anthro: Anthro
13.title: Charlotte the Bear Cub

14.content:
Name: Devynn
Age: 12
Appearance: Devynn has dirty blonde hair and dark green eyes. She is 4'9", which is a little short for her age. She also has faint freckles around her nose and under her eyes. Her teeth are pearly white, only blemished by her tight blue braces that she expects to get taken off soon. She wares a faded purple shirt which is a little big for her, in contrast to her tight black short shorts and tight pink leggings that cut off 6 inches above her ankles.

Continue with Devynn?
14.title: Devynn; Age 12

142.content:
Personality: Devynn is very fun and playful. She doesn't recognize tinies as living and breathing people, and often likes to test their durability.
Backstory: Devynn was very spoiled by her parents growing up. When she was 11, she shrank her first victim: her 15 year old older sister. Her parents were mortified when they walked in on Devynn torturing her older sister. Afraid that they too might invoke her wrath, they let their only surviving daughter do whatever she wants, especially to the people around her!


Where should the story
142.title: Yes, shrinking story

choices: Yes, and he brought a friend
No, he went to a friend's Christmas Party instead
1421.content:
Devynn loathed the Christmas party every year. It was hosted at her house, so instead of playing with the toys she received earlier that day, she had to spend the entire afternoon doing chores and fixing up the house so it didn't look like a mess when her extended family showed up. Her mother spent the entire day whipping up delicious foods and desserts in the kitchen, and her dad ran errands outside the house doing as supply runs and last minute shopping. That left Devynn with cleaning duty. This happened every year except last—which was the first Christmas without their oldest daughter. Whether it was out of fear or pity, Devynn's parents decided not to force her into helping out that year.

But this year was different; Devynn volunteered to help clean the house. She wanted everything to be perfect for the night. She hung up red and green lights along the windows and doors. She filled up bowls with chips and laid out cookies on the table. She even made sure the hardwood floors were spotless, and for the first time in months she decided to clean her room. Devynn didn't care about playing with her gifts this year, despite how plentiful they were. As far as she was concerned, her most anticipated toy hadn't arrived yet.

Tonight at the Christmas party, Devynn was going to shrink her older cousin Gavin. Gavin was Devynn's 16 year old cousin. He had smooth ember hair and a thin frame. Devynn had dreamed of shrinking him for months, but she wouldn't see him again until the Christmas Party. She was so excited to play with him. Sometimes, she would shrink boys at school and pretend that they were him.

When the clock struck 7:00 pm, Devynn ran downstairs, her pink adidas sneakers banging against the hardwood stairs.

"Sweetie," Devynn's mom said. "Don't you think you should change into something else for the party tonight? What about those pretty flats Santa brought you today?"

"I like my sneakers." Devynn said. "If you really want me to change, maybe you should wear them with me? The insoles felt uncomfortable, but I'm sure you'd make them enjoyable."

Sweat dripped from her mom's forehead. The door bell rang, and she jumped up. "It's okay sweetie, your sneakers are just fine." She smiled and made her way for the door. Her cousins walked through the door, but it wasn't Gavin's family. Aunt Cristy and Uncle Rick each gave Devynn's mom a hug and moved into the living area. Their two daughters— Olivia (8) and Amy (13)— behind them. Uncle Rick walked over to Devynn and gave her a hug while his daughters dug into the chips.

Ten minutes go by, and finally theres another knock at the door. It was them! Aunt Carol walked through the door, holding Baby Brian (13 months) in her arms. Uncle Erin walked in next, holding little Ariel's (4) hand. Devynn looked towards the door. Did Gavin come in next?
1421.title: Family Christmas Party

15.content: Okay, we went through one slot of options, here is more.
15.title: More Story Slot options

Type of story it will be: Growth ONLY

Normal or Anthro: normal/human
151.title: Story Slot 5

152.content:
Name: Hilda
Age: 4
Height: 3' 7" (see below)
Appearance: She has long brown hair and blue eyes, and she wears a dark purple dress with a matching pointed witch hat, along with orange and black striped stockings and black Mary Janes shoes.
Personality: She's very mischievous and playful, and loves to use her magic to turn the tables on adults.
Powers: She's a very smart and skilled witch for her age, and can cast all sorts of amazing magic spells.
Backstory: Hilda is a little witch who lives with her mother in a cozy house near the woods outside a small town. Even though she's only four years old, her magical skills are already greater than that of some adult witches, and she loves to play all sorts of games with non-magical folk when her mother isn't around.
Type of story it will be: She can either grow herself or shrink other people.
Normal or Anthro: Normal
152.title: Hilda the Witch

155.content: Okay, here are even more story options
155.title: More Story Slot Options

1553.content: Well these story slots keep on coming. I am making no more until the first 12 is taken.
1553.title: More options

info.brief_description: Kids can be giantesses to. Come and make your kid grow or shrink others. 500gp for adds.
info.description:
Disclaimer here. This story is only mention to be for entertainment and to only be treated as such, so don’t take anything here too seriously. I have had people come and tell me that on this type of stuff, so I do encourage y’all not to be those types of people. Yes they are kids in this story, but don’t think that this is a pedophile story. I am only making this interactive for entertainment, nothing else.

Guess who is back after so many years of inactivity. That’s right, me. I have went by many names, and recently UltimateGiantess is my current one, but now I have officially return to writing interactives for many people. And to show I am coming back, I am introducing the Child-Preteen giantess story to everyone.

Hey, younger girls from ages 1-12 can become giantesses as well if you choose to do it. Make them grow big or shrink others in your own storylines, and now for the first story ever, I am introducing anthro continent as well so if you want to do anthros, very well.

Now here are some rules to follow. I really only have just several to introduce.

No Male Giants, that is an obvious one.
No nudity, these are little girls for Christ’s sake, have them at least in a bikini or something.
Please be very careful with the sexual acts and scat on the kids, I really don’t want to go overboard, and at least have some build up as well to it.
No unbirth
You can make more than one giantess in a story.
You will decide and announce if your story will be a growth story or a shrink story, and if it will be an anthro story as well in the format below.

Have Fun!

Here is the character form that you will have to fill out in each chapter.

Name:
Age:
Height:
Appearance:
Personality:
Powers: (if any)
Backstory:
Type of story it will be: (Growth or Shrink)
Normal or Anthro: this here will decide where the story goes.

Reminder to add to these as well

Girlzilla: https://www.writing.com/main/interactive-story/item_id/2226717-Girlzilla-Giantes...

Life of a Giant Kid/Kidzilla: https://www.writing.com/main/interactive-story/item_id/2226082-Life-of-a-Giant-K...

Gigantic Lolis: https://www.writing.com/main/interactive-story/item_id/2222635-Gigantic-Lolis-a-...

The Daibijin Interactive: https://www.writing.com/main/interactive-story/item_id/2219621-The-Daibijin-Inte...

Chantal: https://www.writing.com/main/interactive-story/item_id/1881854-Chantal-The-Drago...

A Typical Life of a Kaiju Giantess: https://www.writing.com/main/interactive-story/item_id/1845671-ATypical-Life-as-...
